comments.author: JollyGood
comments.body: Quote from: Jellyelle on November 05, 2023, 07:27:54 PMHi everyone.I‚Äôm here cuz I‚Äôm in need to cover my negative balance so I can continue my business.I do not offer to give loans but if I were to ever consider doing it I would never give a loan to any member (newbie or otherwise) without collateral, unless I had an understanding with them. Nobody in the forum knows anything about you therefore why do you expect you will receive a loan?Just out of curiosity, what would have been the harm if you had used the word "because" of "cuz"? At least that would have displayed you were somewhat articulate.
